### GetConfigurations
{{% example csharp %}}
```csharp
using Pulumi;
using AzureNextGen = Pulumi.AzureNextGen;

class MyStack : Stack
{
    public MyStack()
    {
        var roleDefinition = new AzureNextGen.Authorization.Latest.RoleDefinition("roleDefinition", new AzureNextGen.Authorization.Latest.RoleDefinitionArgs
        {
            RoleDefinitionId = "roleDefinitionId",
            Scope = "scope",
        });
    }

}

```

<a href="#role_type_python" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">role_<wbr>type</a>
</span> 
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type"><a href="https://docs.python.org/3/library/stdtypes.html">str</a></span>
    </dt>
    <dd>{{% md %}}The role type.{{% /md %}}</dd>

</dl>
{{% /choosable %}}






### Outputs

All [input](#inputs) properties are implicitly available as output properties. Additionally, the RoleDefinition resource produces the following output properties:
